name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack
summary: The Castellan Champion Upgrade Pack includes the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe, and the Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters Original Soundtrack.
